parsing_result:
# Checking the Battery Level

After turning the camera on, check the battery level in the display.

Battery level is shown as follows:

!Battery Level Display

| Indicator       | Description                                      |
|-----------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| !Icon | Battery partially discharged.                  |
| !Icon | Battery about 80% full.                        |
| !Icon | Battery about 60% full.                        |
| !Icon | Battery about 40% full.                        |
| !Icon | Battery about 20% full.                        |
| !Icon | Low battery. Charge as soon as possible.       |
| (blinks red)    | Battery exhausted. Turn camera off and recharge battery. |
